metadata.title: Casa Petanque - Luxury Vacation Home in Avándaro, Valle de Bravo
metadata.description: Experience Casa Petanque in Avándaro, Valle de Bravo. Luxury vacation rental with 4 bedrooms, 5.5 baths, accommodates 16+ guests. Perfect lakeside retreat with pétanque court, mountain views, and modern amenities.

hero.title: Welcome to Casa Petanque
hero.subtitle: Luxury retreat with hot tub, sauna & game room in Valle de Bravo
hero.description: Discover the perfect blend of luxury and nature. Brand new house with jacuzzi, sauna, game room, and endless entertainment. Pet-friendly, long-term stays welcome.

feature1.title: Authentic Petanque Court
feature1.description: Professional-grade petanque court for endless entertainment
feature1.description2: This brand new house offers endless entertainment with a private hot tub, steam sauna, game room with air hockey and pool tables, ping pong, badminton court, pétanque court, HDTV with Netflix/Prime/Hulu, and board games. Enjoy the fully fenced private backyard with BBQ grill, outdoor kitchen, fire pit, outdoor dining area, and hammocks. Features include wood-burning fireplace, dedicated workspace, washer/dryer, and parking for 8 cars. Pet-friendly and perfect for long-term stays!

feature2.title: Stunning Location
feature2.description: Nestled in a peaceful setting with breathtaking views

feature3.description: Fully equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay

feature4.description: Immerse yourself in the local culture and traditions

cta.title: Ready to Experience Casa Pétanque?
cta.subtitle: Book your stay today and immerse yourself in the perfect blend of luxury and tradition

about.title: About Casa Petanque
about.subtitle: A Story of Passion and Hospitality

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Casa Petanque began as a dream to create a special gathering place where families and friends could disconnect from daily life and reconnect with each other. Named after the beloved French game of pétanque, our home embodies the spirit of leisurely afternoons, friendly competition, and meaningful conversations.
story.paragraph2: We discovered this magical spot in Avándaro, surrounded by towering pine trees and the peaceful sounds of the forest. The property felt perfect - spacious enough for large gatherings yet intimate enough for quiet moments of reflection. We carefully designed every space to encourage both togetherness and privacy.
story.paragraph3: Today, Casa Petanque welcomes guests seeking authentic experiences in Valle de Bravo. Whether you're here for adventure, relaxation, or celebration, our home provides the perfect base for creating lasting memories with the people who matter most.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: Every detail at Casa Pétanque reflects our commitment to excellence and authentic hospitality

experience.title: The Experience
experience.paragraph1: Wake up to the sounds of birds singing in the surrounding forest. Start your day with coffee in the garden, breathing in the fresh mountain air and planning your adventures in Valle de Bravo - from paragliding and sailing to exploring the charming colonial town center.
experience.paragraph2: Afternoons at Casa Petanque are for leisure - challenge friends to a game on our professional pétanque court, enjoy the game room with pool and air hockey, or simply relax in a hammock under the trees. As evening falls, gather around the fire pit, soak in the hot tub, or unwind in the steam sauna.
experience.paragraph3: Valle de Bravo offers year-round perfect weather and endless activities. Just minutes from our forest sanctuary, you'll find water sports on the lake, hiking trails, charming restaurants, and local markets. Return home to your private retreat where the only sounds are the wind in the pines and laughter from the pétanque court.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your stay

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: We're here to help. Feel free to reach out to us anytime.

q1.question: What is petanque?
q1.answer: Petanque is a traditional French game similar to boules or bocce. Players throw metal balls as close as possible to a small wooden ball called a cochonnet. Our professional court is perfect for both beginners and experienced players.

q2.question: How many people can stay at Casa Petanque?
q2.answer: Casa Petanque comfortably accommodates 16+ guests with 4 bedrooms (8 beds) and 5.5 bathrooms. Perfect for large families or group gatherings.

q3.question: What amenities are included?
q3.answer: The house features a fully equipped kitchen with all appliances and cooking basics, Wi-Fi, dedicated workspace, HDTV with Netflix/Prime/Hulu, DVD player, jacuzzi, steam sauna, game room with air hockey and pool tables, ping pong, badminton court, petanque court, board games, wood-burning fireplace, washer/dryer, private garden with BBQ grill and outdoor kitchen, fire pit, outdoor dining area, hammocks, parking for 8 cars, and 24/7 on-site staff. All essentials provided including linens, towels, toiletries, and kitchen basics.

q4.question: Is the property suitable for families and pets?
q4.answer: Yes! Casa Petanque is family-friendly with cribs, fireplace guards, and a fully fenced private backyard. Pets are welcome! We also allow smoking in designated areas and offer long-term stays of 28+ days. Self check-in is available with 24/7 building staff to assist you.

q5.question: Where is Casa Petanque located?
q5.answer: Casa Petanque is located in Avándaro, Valle de Bravo, Estado de México. This charming lakeside town is about 2 hours from Mexico City, offering a perfect escape with beautiful lake views, mountain scenery, and year-round pleasant weather.

q6.question: What's not included?
q6.answer: The property does not have air conditioning (though heating is available) and there are no exterior security cameras on the property. However, the mild Valle de Bravo climate rarely requires AC, and the house has heating for cooler evenings.

q7.question: What's provided in the bedrooms and bathrooms?
q7.answer: All bedrooms include bed linens, room-darkening shades, hangers, and an iron. Bathrooms are stocked with hair dryers, shampoo, hot water, towels, soap, and toilet paper. We also provide cribs for families with babies and have fireplace guards for child safety.

q8.question: Can I work remotely from the property?
q8.answer: Absolutely! The house features high-speed WiFi throughout and a dedicated workspace in a private room with a door, perfect for video calls and focused work. The peaceful garden setting provides an inspiring environment for remote work.
